name: Robomancer_000
description:
"If you're in the audience today, please cheer for both of us as loud as you can!"

-@-@-@-

In this final match, you're Jyoti! A hopeful Robomancer, with the cutest bot Anushka! You've followed your heart this far into the Robomancer 2090 games, where will it lead you in the upcoming match?

Key elements of this game:

  • Nonbinary protagonist and love interest
  • Beautiful bots
  • Very short game
  • A reflection on some past relationship stuff, through the lens of cool robot games tournaments?

Reviews/Comments are great! - I'll keep tabs on the #robomancer000 tag on twitter!

Yes, you may LetsPlay/Stream! - Please enjoy this game with your friends all over the world!

Please add proper closed captioning for your videos, so everyone can enjoy watching your video! 

Songs used:
TimeTrain by P C III
Rest by P C III
Lightbull by Monplaisir
